Package abyss.plugin.api

Class Plugin

java.lang.Object
abyss.plugin.api.Plugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
abyss.plugin.api.extensions.ExtensionContainer<abyss.plugin.api.extensions.Extension>
public abstract class Plugin extends Object implements abyss.plugin.api.extensions.ExtensionContainer<abyss.plugin.api.extensions.Extension>
All plugins must extend this base type.

  • Method Details

    • onLoaded

      public boolean onLoaded(PluginContext pluginContext)
      Called when the plugin is loaded into the client.
      Returns:
      If the plugin will run or not.

    • onEnabled

      public void onEnabled()
      Called when this plugin is enabled in the plugin list.

    • onDisabled

      public void onDisabled()
      Called when this plugin is disabled in the plugin list.

    • onLoop

      public int onLoop()
      Called when the client is ticking, and it's time for us to loop again. The client will wait for the amount of milliseconds you return before calling this function again.
      Returns:
      The amount of time to wait before invoking this function again.

    • onServerTick

      public int onServerTick(Player self, long tickCount)
      Called when the server sends the end of tick packet
      Parameters:
      self - - The Local Player
      tickCount - - The tick count since login (resets to 0 on logout)
      Returns:
      - the number of ticks to wait

    • onPaint

      public void onPaint()
      Called when the plugin's window is being painted.

    • onPaintOverlay

      public void onPaintOverlay()
      Called when the client's 3d overlay is being painted.

    • onVarbitRequest

      public void onVarbitRequest(int varbitId, int varpId, int value)
      Called when the runescape client asks for the value of a varbit
      Parameters:
      varbitId - - The Varbit ID
      varpId - - The ConVarID that the varbit is stored in
      value - - The Value of the requested Varbit

    • onVarpRequest

      public void onVarpRequest(int varpId, int value)
      Called when the RuneScape client asks for the value of a varp (ConVar)
      Parameters:
      varpId - The varp id
      value - The varp value

    • onWidgetVisibilityChanged

      public void onWidgetVisibilityChanged(int id, boolean visible)
      Called when the visibility of a widget changes.

    • onLocalPlayerChanged

      public void onLocalPlayerChanged(Player self)
      Called when the local player is changed. This is useful for initializing plugin data about the local player.

    • onSceneObjectSpawned

      public void onSceneObjectSpawned(int objectId, int x, int y, int type)
      Called when RuneScape gets a spawn object packet
      Parameters:
      objectId - The object id
      x - The x coordinate where the object is being spawned
      y - The y coordinate where the object is being spawned
      type - The type of object (wall, groun decor, etc)

    • onSceneObjectDestroyed

      public void onSceneObjectDestroyed(int objectId, int x, int y, int type)
      Called when RuneScape sends destroy scene object packet.
      Parameters:
      objectId - The object id to be destroyed
      x - The x coordinate of the scene object to be destroyed
      y - The y coordinate of the scene object to be destroyed
      type - The type of the scene object to be destroyed

    • onInventoryItemChanged

      public void onInventoryItemChanged(ComponentItem prev, ComponentItem next)

    • interruptBreak

      public boolean interruptBreak()
      Called to determine if a break should be interrupted currently.

      public final void load(PluginContext context)

    • getAccountSpecificRandom

      public Random getAccountSpecificRandom()
      Returns:
      A random instance that is seeded with information about the running account.

    • getSecureRandom

      public Random getSecureRandom()
      Returns:
      A random instance that is secure.
